t: Why do some products on Amazon look the same but have different brand names? - Quora
s: Answer: This is simple to answer. They look similar because the different brands are using the same supplier. This is ok but I suspect they are taking a generic product (like skin cream or headphones) but are not doing any modifications beyond putting their brand name on the product and packaging...
